title: Teacher Professional Development Workshop for Student-Centered E-Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: University-level language education experience and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Program Supporting University Language Educators in Designing and Implementing Student Engagement-Maximizing E-Learning Activities

learning_goals: Participants can derive three or more student-centered e-learning activity design frameworks based on DBR methodology
Participants can design two or more types of digital language education content based on learner analytics
Participants can diagnose e-learning activity effectiveness with over 80% accuracy using formative assessment tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
